title.rendered: The Top 5 Reasons Why You Hate Online Leads … and How a Good CRM Will Make You Love Them

content.rendered:
Learn to Love Online Leads With the Help of a CRM

In this webinar recording, online real estate strategy experts Sheldon Rapoza and Jenn Tervo uncover the truth behind the most common misconceptions about online leads and overcome agents’ biggest objections to them.

From bad phone numbers to non-responsive leads, you’ll learn how having the right tools and training can not only change your mindset about online leads, but also greatly increase your ability to successfully engage with them and convert them into clients.

Get More Leads for Your Business!

With Market Leader, you can get a guaranteed number of leads every month that are exclusive — not shared with other agents. Lead inventory is limited, so check availability in your desired areas today!

Check Lead Availability
